sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The Churches ardent love to Christ being a paraphrase on Cant. 1. 2, 3 / by J.J. Jordan, Joshua. R. B. To the ingenious Mr. Joshua Jordan on his foregoing poem. C. B. To the bookseller on the foregoing poem.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for John Taylor at the Ship in St. Paul's Church-Yard, London : 1687.
Caption title. Attributed to Joshua Jordan. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.). Imprint from colophon. Imperfect: broadside creased and stained. Includes the Song of Solomon chapter paraphrases as well as 2 additional poems dedicated to Jordan and to the bookseller initialed by the authors. Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library. The Churches ardent love to Christ being a paraphrase on Cant. 1. 2, 3 / by J.J. -- To the ingenious Mr. Joshua Jordan on his foregoing poem / R.B. -- To the bookseller on the foregoing poem / C.B.
=======

Printed for John Taylor at the Ship in St. Paul's Church-Yard, London : 1687.

Includes the Song of Solomon chapter paraphrases as well as 2 additional poems dedicated to Jordan and to the bookseller initialed by the authors. Reproduction of original in: Harvard University.
